column4: so if you use apt-zip, and you specify a flash drive as an apt-source on anotehr compy.. what you put on the flash drive using apt-zip can be apt-get install from the flash drive on another comp?
is that the way it works
essentially, you do an apt-zip on the machine you want to install, it writes a script you can take to another manchine & run. That'll get the debs you need
